sentences.english: Duanwu Festival is also called Dragon Boat Festival.
It is known as the Dragon Boat Festival because it involves dragon boat races;
sentences.chinese: 它因“龙舟节”出名，因为人们要在那天划龙舟。

sentences.english: It is known as the Dragon Boat Festival because it involves dragon boat races;
sentences.chinese: 它因“龙舟节”出名，因为人们要在那天划龙舟。

sentences.english: People watch the dragon boat race, too.
The Yuanling dragon boat race boasts four World Bests.
sentences.chinese: 沅陵龙舟竞渡拥有四个世界之最。

sentences.english: The Dragon-boat race is always a popular festival event in all parts of China.
sentences.chinese: 龙舟竞渡，历来是深受各地民众喜爱的节日活动。

sentences.english: "Dragon Boat" is one of the masterpieces of whitewood carving.
sentences.chinese: “龙舟”是其木雕刻的杰作之一。

sentences.english: For China, it's a time for dragon boat racing.
sentences.chinese: 对于中国来说，这是个划龙舟，吃粽子的日子。

sentences.english: The Dragon Boat Team competed with all their strengths in the competition.
sentences.chinese: 香港龙舟队运动员在赛中全力以赴。

sentences.english: Dragon boat race is one of the traditional Chinese sports.
sentences.chinese: “龙舟竞渡”是中华民族传统体育项目之一。

sentences.english: Dragon boat festival is also called Duanwujie.
And we saw the Dragon Boat Races.
A:Could you tell me the origin of the Dragon-Boat Festival?
sentences.chinese: 把龙舟节的来历告诉我好吗？

sentences.english: Other than the Dragon Boat Races, what's special about this day?
sentences.chinese: 除了龙舟赛，这一天还有什么特别的活动吗？

sentences.english: Dragon boat races were held on a large scale in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 赛龙舟活动在唐朝规模很大。

sentences.english: I think I’ll join in on the boat competitions.
sentences.chinese: 我想我会去参加龙舟比赛。

definition: dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)
rowing competition/boat race/swimming competition (e.g. to cross river or lake)
Chinese treasure ship, a type of large sailing ship in the fleet of Ming dynasty admiral Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2]
